title: Telecom Device
description: A device or communication endpoint used to transmit observational data from a platform, typically identified by a phone number or IMEI.

@context.description: The JSON-LD context defining term mappings.

@type.description: The JSON-LD type of the resource.

@id.description: The globally unique URI identifier for this resource.

number.description: The phone number or contact identifier used for communication.

imei.description: The International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) number assigned to the telecom device.

technology.description: The URI of the telecommunication technology used (e.g., IRIDIUM, GSM, VHF).
